mean_en: to achieve something that you have been trying to do or get; to have the result or effect that was intended; to be successful in your job, earning money, power, respect, etc.
sentence: I succeeded in shooting three arrows in the center of the target.
sentence_trans: 我成功地将三支箭都射中了靶心。
word_etyma: suc在…下面 + ceed走 → 从下走到上面 → succeed成功
